requirements.summary: Create home page with hero, about, services, and contact sections
acceptanceCriteria: Home page displays a compelling hero section introducing paranormal investigation services
About section describes the investigation team and their expertise
Services section lists different types of paranormal investigations offered
Contact section provides ways to reach the investigation team

file_operations.description: Create home page component with hero section using the generated hero background image from frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-paranormal.dim_1920x1080.png, about section describing the investigation team, services section listing paranormal investigation types (apparitions, unexplained sounds, moving objects, electromagnetic anomalies), and contact section with contact information
Wire the Home page component into the router as the root path and update navigation to include links to all main pages

requirements.summary: Implement case submission form with photo upload capability
acceptanceCriteria: Form includes required fields for location, phenomena type, event description, and contact information
Form validates all required fields before submission
Users can optionally upload photos of paranormal evidence
Form submissions are stored in the backend
Users receive confirmation after successful submission

file_operations.description: Create case submission form page with fields for location (text input), phenomena type (select dropdown with options: apparitions, unexplained sounds, moving objects, electromagnetic anomalies), description (textarea), contact information (text input), and optional photo upload. Use the blob-storage component's ExternalBlob class to handle photo uploads. Include form validation for required fields and call backend.submitCase() on form submission. Display success confirmation after submission. Verify the blob-storage component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add route for /submit-case path and include navigation link to the case submission page

requirements.summary: Create case gallery page with filtering by phenomena type and location
acceptanceCriteria: Gallery displays all submitted cases in a grid or list layout
Each case shows: title, location, phenomena type, brief description, and date
Users can filter cases by phenomena type
Users can filter cases by location
Clicking a case opens detailed view with full description and photos

file_operations.description: Create case gallery page that fetches cases using backend.getAllCases(), displays them in a grid layout with case cards showing location, phenomena type, brief description, and timestamp. Include filter controls for phenomena type and location that call backend.filterCasesByType() and backend.filterCasesByLocation(). Each case card should be clickable to navigate to the case detail page. Use the blob-storage component's ExternalBlob.getDirectURL() method to display case photos when available. Verify the blob-storage component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create case detail page that fetches a specific case using backend.getCaseById() based on URL parameter. Display full case information including location, phenomena type, complete description, contact information, submission timestamp, investigation status, and photo if available. Use the blob-storage component's ExternalBlob.getDirectURL() method to display the full-size photo. Verify the blob-storage component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add routes for /cases path (gallery) and /cases/:caseId path (detail view), and include navigation link to the case gallery page

requirements.summary: Create investigation resources page with paranormal phenomena information
acceptanceCriteria: Resources page is organized into clear sections with navigation
Page describes different types of paranormal phenomena with examples
Page lists common investigation equipment and their purposes
Page provides guidelines for documenting evidence
Page includes safety tips for paranormal investigations

file_operations.description: Create resources page with organized sections covering: types of paranormal phenomena (apparitions, unexplained sounds, moving objects, electromagnetic anomalies) with descriptions and examples; common investigation equipment (EMF meters, thermal cameras, audio recorders, etc.) and their uses; evidence documentation best practices; and safety precautions for paranormal investigations. Use Shadcn UI components like Tabs or Accordion for section navigation
Add route for /resources path and include navigation link to the resources page

Typography has a vintage or mysterious character appropriate for paranormal investigation
UI includes subtle atmospheric effects like shadows, glows, or gentle animations
Overall aesthetic balances professionalism with supernatural mystery
Design is consistent across all pages

file_operations.description: Update global styles with dark color scheme using deep purples, midnight blues, and ethereal greens as primary colors. Apply vintage-inspired typography with mysterious character. Add CSS variables for the paranormal theme colors and define base text, background, and accent colors

Extend Tailwind configuration with custom color palette for the paranormal theme (deep purple, midnight blue, ethereal green shades). Add custom font families with vintage/mysterious character. Configure subtle animation utilities for atmospheric effects like glows, shadows, and gentle movements

Create layout wrapper component that includes header with the investigation team logo from frontend/public/assets/generated/logo-investigation-team.dim_256x256.png, main navigation menu, and footer. Apply atmospheric styling with subtle effects consistent with the paranormal theme. This layout will wrap all pages for consistent design
Wrap all routes with the Layout component to ensure consistent header, navigation, and footer across all pages

Hero background image is displayed on the home page

Images load correctly and enhance the paranormal theme
